body:
Ah interesting, thanks for the correction.

Those tarballs are still not generated by the Go team, they come out of either gitiles or gerrit, I'm not sure which. I believe this is the particular issue: https://code.google.com/p/gitiles/issues/detail?id=3 which states "The details of the archive that produces aren't set in stone yet (e.g., I'd like to make project-revision.tar.gz prefix pathnames of its entries with project-revision/)." I suggest chiming in there.
